activities: Our company produces software that companies include in their applications. The software helps these companies communicate with their customers. At times, the end customer includes their email information or shares other information about themselves to share more with the company who makes the app. This information is shared by the consumer with just the maker of the app and is in the pursuit of better customer service and more personalized relationships.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Email addresses, phone numbers, social network identifications, addresses, other account information that is relevant to the relationship between the company and customer. This data is processed on our servers automatically.
